title: Inside the Parker - Scherzer Dodger Debut, Cole Hamels Comeback, Astros Unpleasant L.A. Visit with Ben Verlander
itunes:title: Inside the Parker - Scherzer Dodger Debut, Cole Hamels Comeback, Astros Unpleasant L.A. Visit with Ben Verlander
description:
This week on Inside the (Rob) Parker, Rob reacts to Max Scherzer's Dodger debut and what he expects going forward, Cole Hamels surprisingly signing for a year with the Dodgers, and the release of the 2022 MLB schedule. Also, Pocket Protector Stat of the Week and Foul or Fair.

Guests: Fox Sports Analyst Ben Verlander weighs in on Dodgers fans unleashing on the Astros over the cheating scandal, and the Cubs unloading the core of their title team at the trade deadline.

Longtime Los Angeles Sports Reporter Ted Sobel discusses his book Touching Greatness which looks back on his interactions with countless celebrities during his long broadcasting career.

Click here to subscribe and download all of the latest Inside the Parker podcasts and follow Rob on Twitter!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
